WOW! That's good. Really, really, good. Is this one of the stories that have been published? I sure if you submitted it to a collection it would be accepted! That's awesome.
Gotta run, my dog just got bitten by a snake (about 6x) better go to the vet... Talk to you later...
How's your dog doing now? I hope he's ok...

Yeah, she fine. She's been bitten several times before. She doesn't seem to be learning:xbanghead . It took her to the vet because the snake must have been HUGE. The fangs were over 1/2 apart. And deep. But she's fine. Probably almost immune by now! Thanks for asking.
 
 BTW- almost done. 102K words. 2 more chapters. Then I'll send the whole thing for you to peruse at your leisure and I'll send each chapter as I do the first rewrite... Sound OK?
